channel.title: Custom Item Maker!
channel.description:
I'm working on a custom item maker that will take the things you enter(color choice, name, id, description) and add it into the correct spot of the item. I Made This thread to ask every one What custom item would you like it to be able to make???
[i][b][size=15pt][font=Verdana]THIS IS NOT SERVER SIDE ITS CLIENT SIDE. IT WILL NOT ADD ITEM INTO CLIENT YOU MUST DO THIS ON YOUR OWN!!!! LOOK IT UP!!!! PLEASE POST A ITEM YOU WANT ADDED[/font][/size][/b][/i]
[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?zztfvfwnlu3]http://www.mediafire.com/?zztfvfwnlu3[/URL] - MAIN MUST GET THIS FIRST [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?2fex2ardz2d]http://www.mediafire.com/?2fex2ardz2d[/URL] Scimitar Addon + Main.bat Upgrade From V1.0 to 1.2 (Delete Main.bat in this file if you download version2) [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?cgtpdzfnyej]http://www.mediafire.com/?cgtpdzfnyej[/URL] Main.bat Upgrade2 (Needed for Dragon Scimitar)
[URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?z2dvj2xxz1e]http://www.mediafire.com/?z2dvj2xxz1e[/URL] Arrow Addons [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?1vexymdx1jx]http://www.mediafire.com/?1vexymdx1jx[/URL] Dagger Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?j2u4nmtzbj0]http://www.mediafire.com/?j2u4nmtzbj0[/URL] Long Sword Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?uj9b2bomdc1]http://www.mediafire.com/?uj9b2bomdc1[/URL] Med Helm Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?z4deze3ii9e]http://www.mediafire.com/?z4deze3ii9e[/URL] Short sword Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?gx3jg0fjdld]http://www.mediafire.com/?gx3jg0fjdld[/URL] Dragon Scimitar Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?nvuyyeyyy59]http://www.mediafire.com/?nvuyyeyyy59[/URL] Whip Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?zmy174jm9b2]http://www.mediafire.com/?zmy174jm9b2[/URL] Boots Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?sy5jnbzbmw9]http://www.mediafire.com/?sy5jnbzbmw9[/URL] Gloves Addon [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?0nyb1imbdnz]http://www.mediafire.com/?0nyb1imbdnz[/URL] Capes Addon
HELP IS NOW ON THE WEBSITE. IT HAS 9 PICS TO HELP YOU ADD THE ITEMS.
The Site In My Sig Now

yellow whip-didn’t colour
purple bow- it wielded & coloured!
orange party hat-weilded in wrong spot(wepon spot) but still looked good

item.title: Custom Item Maker!
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

I Just released 7 addon including. Arrows, Arrow tips, Dragon Dagger, Dragon Med Helm, Short Sword(Sword), Long Sword, and scimitars, along with the scimitar is a IMPORTANT main.bat that should replace the old Main.bat file (I Made it were the Main.bat can support all 19 Item addons im about to release(the old only allows 14 addons).

Each addon is not required. you can download only the addon you want or you can download every addon it it totally up to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Item Maker!
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

I will try adding that but there is no garrentee(there are like 6 colors to that one which would eliminate the custom option unless you knew the color code for every thing you wanted. like plate bodies for custom you would have to enter the main bodie part the sholder pads and that would not be hard to code just a bit time consuming thats y for no im sticking with the basic 1-3 diff color items like arrows, bows, sword, ext

Read full topic
